body:
for temporary solution, replace [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py#L73) as below:
```
unique_data_ptrs = set(p.data_ptr() if not hasattr(p, 'grad') else p.data.data_ptr() for l in self.all_weights for p in l)
```
see the reason causes this problem, see [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3853).
